subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Devils were in first place in the Eastern Conference when their game against the Montreal Canadiens began at 7:11 p.m. Saturday. By 5:40 p.m. Sunday, the Devils were in fourth place.
snippet: The Devils were in first place in the Eastern Conference when their game against the Montreal Canadiens began at 7:11 p.m. Saturday. By 5:40 p.m. Sunday, the Devils were in fourth place.
